types.section:
{{fr-intj}} !

# {{lb|fr|informal}} [[it goes to show]]!

====Usage notes====
* Often followed by a [[direct object]], or a [[subordinate clause]] introduced by {{m|fr|si}}: ''c'est dire si [...]'', "it just shows that".
* Not to be confused with {{m|fr|c'est-à-dire}}.

title: c'est dire
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /s‿ɛ diʁ/
